trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用線性插補在指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的兩個目標值之間繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 動畫經過一段時間更新屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape> a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color.
trans-unit.target: 動畫效果可以是難以察覺的例如移動<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape>幾個像素為單位向左和右或明顯的例如同時微調並變更其色彩會放大 200 的時間成原始大小的物件。

trans-unit.source: To create an animation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you must associate an animation with an object's property value.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立動畫中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，您必須將動畫關聯物件的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Target Values
trans-unit.target: 目標值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation> class creates a transition between two target values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation>類別會建立兩個目標值之間的轉換。

trans-unit.source: To set its target values, use its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定其目標值，請使用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。

trans-unit.source: Properties specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性

trans-unit.source: Resulting behavior
trans-unit.target: 產生的行為

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性所指定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性指定的總和值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性會優先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames>物件。

trans-unit.source: For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 將多個動畫套用至單一屬性的相關資訊，請參閱[主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation> class inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation> objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation>類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation>物件取得數個特殊的功能，包括下列： 它們可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，和進行安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的目的值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 從開始到結束播放一次動畫所花的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> class that animates to the specified value over the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會在指定的持續期間內，以動畫展示指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The starting value for the animation is the base value of the property being animated or the output from another animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的起始值是展示動畫之屬性的基底數值，或另一個動畫的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的目的值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 從開始到結束播放一次動畫所花的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the animation behaves when it is not active.
trans-unit.target: 指定動畫為非使用中的行為方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> class that animates to the specified value over the specified duration and has the specified fill behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會在指定的持續期間內，以動畫展示指定的值，並且具有指定的填滿行為。

trans-unit.source: The starting value for the animation is the base value of the property being animated or the output from another animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的起始值是展示動畫之屬性的基底數值，或另一個動畫的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The starting value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的目的值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 從開始到結束播放一次動畫所花的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> class that animates from the specified starting value to the specified destination value over the specified duration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會在指定的持續期間內，建立從指定起始值到指定目的值的動畫。

trans-unit.source: The starting value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的目的值。

trans-unit.source: The length of time the animation takes to play from start to finish, once.
trans-unit.target: 從開始到結束播放一次動畫所花的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the animation behaves when it is not active.
trans-unit.target: 指定動畫為非使用中的行為方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> class that animates from the specified starting value to the specified destination value over the specified duration and has the specified fill behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會在指定的持續期間內，建立從指定起始值到指定目的值的動畫，並具有指定的填滿行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定動畫變更其起始值所依據的總量。

trans-unit.source: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
trans-unit.target: 動畫變更其起始值所依據的總量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性，當您想要製作動畫值，「 者 」 一定數量，而非指定的開始或結束值。

trans-unit.source: You may also use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性

trans-unit.source: Resulting Behavior
trans-unit.target: 產生的行為

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性所指定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性指定的總和值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**如果同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性會優先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames>物件。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: <*object* `By`="<xref:System.Windows.Size>"/>
trans-unit.target: <*object* `By`="<xref:System.Windows.Size>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>
trans-unit.target: <*物件* `By`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ >

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object*>
trans-unit.target: \<*object*>

trans-unit.source: <*object*.`By`>
trans-unit.target: <*object*.`By`>

trans-unit.source: </*object*.`By`>
trans-unit.target: </*object*.`By`>

trans-unit.source: \</*object*>
trans-unit.target: \</*object*>

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to this animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至這個動畫的 easing 函式。

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to this animation.
trans-unit.target: 套用至這個動畫的 easing 函式。

trans-unit.source: Easing functions allow you to create a variety of specialized animation effects including bouncing, spring oscillations, and various magnitude acceleration and deceleration animations.
trans-unit.target: 加/減速函數可讓您建立各種不同的特製化的動畫效果包括彈跳、 彈簧振動和各種大小加速和減速動畫。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.EasingFunction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.EasingFunction" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the animation's starting value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此動畫的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The starting value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的起始值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性

trans-unit.source: Resulting Behavior
trans-unit.target: 產生的行為

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性所指定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性指定的總和值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**如果同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性會優先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames>物件。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: <*object* `From`="<xref:System.Windows.Size>"/>
trans-unit.target: <*object* `From`="<xref:System.Windows.Size>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<*object* `From`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>
trans-unit.target: <*物件* `From`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ >

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: \<*object*>
trans-unit.target: \<*object*>

trans-unit.source: <*object*.`By`>
trans-unit.target: <*object*.`By`>

trans-unit.source: </*object*.`By`>
trans-unit.target: </*object*.`By`>

trans-unit.source: \</*object*>
trans-unit.target: \</*object*>

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建議的原始值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的起始值，便會使用這個值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the animation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />，產生動畫所用的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" />.
trans-unit.target: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值，由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation" /> 決定。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的計算值，由目前的動畫所決定。

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不是 <c4 > <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否應該將目標屬性的目前值加入這個動畫的起始值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標屬性的目前值應加入至這個動畫的起始值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the animation has only one of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties set, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫只有其中一個的其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性已設定，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, and is shared by various derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別項欄位來自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，並且可由各種衍生類別共用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否在動畫重複時累加動畫值。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the animation accumulates its values when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果動畫會累加其值時其<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。

trans-unit.source: otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 否則， **false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to **true**, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為**true**，動畫之輸出值只會累積時的動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 它不會累積它的值因為重複其父代重新啟動時，或它的時鐘已重新啟動從<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, and is shared by various derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別項欄位來自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，並且可由各種衍生類別共用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the animation's ending value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此動畫的結束值。

trans-unit.source: The ending value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的結束值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。

trans-unit.source: Properties Specified
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性

trans-unit.source: Resulting Behavior
trans-unit.target: 產生的行為

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性所指定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> property to the value specified by the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從所指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>屬性指定的總和值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.From%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you set both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> properties, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A> property takes precedence and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**如果同時設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.To%2A>屬性會優先和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimation.By%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames>物件。
